# Question 1

## Part a
```{r 1A}

x = c(110.5, 105.4, 118.1, 104.5, 93.6, 84.1, 77.8, 75.6)
y = c(5.755, 5.939, 6.010, 6.545, 6.730, 6.750, 6.899, 7.862)

d = data.frame(c(x,y))

cor(x,y)
```


```{r 1B}
d = data.frame(c(x,y))

fit_d = lm(y~x, data = d)

sumd = summary(fit_d)

print(sumd[10])
```



```{r Q1C}

confint(fit_d)

```
